actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the continuation of the investment tax credit for small businesses.

summary.text: Provides for an investment tax credit for small business for property constructed or acquired after December 31, 1969. Limits such a credit to $15,000 and provides for the application of this limitation to married individuals, affiliated groups and partnerships. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 49)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the continuation of the investment tax credit for small businesses.
